title: Conduct Competitor Analysis
description: A strategist needs to analyze the social media presence of three key competitors to inform an upcoming campaign strategy.

tasks.description: Identify the social media profiles of the three specified competitors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly locates the official social media accounts for the competitors.

tasks.description: Analyze their posting frequency, content themes, and engagement rates over the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts and summarizes key performance metrics for each competitor.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report highlighting competitor strengths, weaknesses, and opportunities for our brand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise report with actionable insights.
